articles.title: C.D.C. Endorses Covid Vaccine Booster Shots for All Adults - The New York Times
articles.description: As infections rise, Americans over 18 will be permitted to get extra doses. But it’s not clear boosters really are needed by so many people, or that the shots will turn back the pandemic.
articles.content: Look what other countries are doing now about adopting a booster campaign virtually for everybody, Dr. Anthony S. Fauci, the Biden administrations top Covid adviser, said at a conference on Tuesday. … [+1490 chars]
